Description

Orange Helicopter is a one-man games studio, founded by former game AI researcher Ed Powley, and based in York, UK.

History

Early history

Many games companies have been founded by university dropouts. I decided to go a less conventional route: I graduated, got a PhD and spent several years working as a researcher before dropping out. My research was on artificial intelligence for board and card games. As well as publishing a number of <a href="http://scholar.google.co.uk/citations?user=ERihGdQAAAAJ">journal and conference articles</a>, my work found its way into the popular Android game <a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.co.aifactory.spadesfree">Spades Free</a> by AI Factory. However I eventually decided that making games from start to finish might be more fun than just making AI.

Now

Orange Helicopter's first title will be Blobjam, a physics-based action puzzle game.

The name

I read somewhere that (random colour) + (random object) was a good way to come up with a memorable company name. Orange Helicopter was the first combination I tried where the .com domain was available. (Note to self: need to ret-con a more interesting origin story for the name.)
